data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR 2015 and relevant circular kindly note that Shri Rajesh Kumar has assumed the charge of Director (Finance) Bharat Coking Coal Limited wef 10.02.2026. Shri Manoj Kumar Agarwal CMD BCCL ceases to hold the additional charge of Director (Finance).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: We are enclosing hard copies of newspaper publication issued on date in two English Newspapers namely The Times of India (Ranchi & Kolkata) & Economic Times (Mumbai & New Delhi) and one Hindi newspaper namely Dainik Bhaskar (Dhanbad) publishing Unaudited Financial Results of Bharat Coking Coal Limited (Standalone) for the 3rd Quarter and Nine Months ended 31st December 2025

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015- Upgradation Of Pay Scale Of Executives
data.news_body:
The pay scales of executives of Coal India Limited (including executives of Bharat Coking Coal Limited) are being revised. 
The revised pay scales shall be notionally fixed with effect from 01.01.2017. The revised payscale is to be implemented from the salary of January 2026 to be paid in February 2026. 
This disclosure is pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR 2015 and SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/PoD2/CIR/P/0155 dated 11th November 2024 kindly note that Shri Sanjay Kumar Agarwal has been transferred from the post of General Manager (Civil-Welfare) and Shri Suman Kumar has been transferred and posted as General Manager (Civil-Welfare) on 03.02.2026. Accordingly Shri Suman Kumar has become Senior Management Personnel of Bharat Coking Coal Limited.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results Of Bharat Coking Coal Limited (Standalone) For The 3Rd Quarter / Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam

       In terms of Regulation 30 read with Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith Un-Audited Financial Results of Bharat Coking Coal Limited (Standalone) for the 3rd Quarter / Nine Months ended 31st December 2025. 

   The Un-Audited financial results were reviewed by the Audit Committee held on date and have been taken on record by the Board of Directors of Bharat Coking Coal Limited at its meeting held on date.
  
    The Board meeting commenced at 12:30 Hrs and concluded at 14:55 Hrs.



          Yours Faithfully

                                                                 For Bharat Coking Coal Limited.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Notice Of 436Th Board Meeting To Be Held On Tuesday 3Rd February 2026 To Consider Financial Results Inter Alia For And Up To 31St December 2025.
data.news_body:
Bharat Coking Coal Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 03/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve 436.4 ITEMS FOR INFORMATION 

436.4A Status of manpower as on 01.01.2026 
436.4B Performance report of December 2025 (Prov.) and progressive till December 2025 & Power Consumption Report & Rake loading performance  for December 2025. 

436.6 ITEMS FOR RATIFICATION/ APPROVAL 

436.6A Proposal for Termination of Contract Agreement Re-opening Development & 
Operation of Loyabad Coal Mine on Revenue Sharing Basis with M/s Loyabad 
Coalfield Private Limited (LCFL) & Return of the whole Bank Guarantee amount 
towards Performance Security (?311038500)

POT 1: Approval of Financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025
and others.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Bharat Coking Coal Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from January 19 2026 the Equity Shares of Bharat Coking Coal Ltd (Scrip Code: 544678) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20260116- dated January 16 2026.
